name: Fusebots
description:
Fusebots

[Created for the Brackeys 2022.2 Game Jam]

Finally! You're free from your cell in the Robot Experimentation Laboratory, but you can't escape on your own, luckily, you're not alone!

Control three modular bots as they clear puzzles trying to escape from a laboratory, use the bots' different abilities and their combinations to overcome the challenges.

Gameplay

A little beaver who fears darkness gets stuck inside the house. The lights keep going out and monsters appear in the darkness and are scaring him. He needs to find his way to his room without letting the monsters get him. He uses the switches to turn the lights on to be safe, and see where he's going.

Controls

 W, A, S, D to move.

J to shoot.

K to block.

L to combine.

U to switch character.

I to change the AI companions mode (Follow or Stay in place).
